TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Bayi, title = Bayi, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bayi} }

S.FORM: bayi Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko bayi a niyaro', 30 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 92 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 83 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal83%, Seediq3%, Bunun3%.

bayi Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko bayi a niyaro', 30 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 92 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 83 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal83%, Seediq3%, Bonon3%.
